se.ltu.android.demo
Class GLSurfaceView

java.lang.Object
  android.view.View
      android.view.SurfaceView
          se.ltu.android.demo.GLSurfaceView
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.SurfaceHolder.Callback
public class GLSurfaceView
extends android.view.SurfaceView
implements android.view.SurfaceHolder.Callback

An implementation of SurfaceView that uses the dedicated surface for displaying an OpenGL animation. This allows the animation to run in a separate thread, without requiring that it be driven by the update mechanism of the view hierarchy.

The application-specific rendering code is delegated to a GLView.Renderer instance.

Instead of using GLSurfaceView that comes with the SDK, this class is based of:
http://code.google.com/p/apps-for-android/source/browse/trunk/SpriteMethodTest/src/com/android/spritemethodtest/GLSurfaceView.java?r=153
This was necessary in order to make VBO's work.

Version:
$Revision: 24 $
Author:
Ã…ke Svedin
